results.title: A Night Out With Solange Knowles at Art Basel
results.abstract: A collector of prints is poised, if not to eclipse the megawattage of her superstar sister, Beyoncé, then to shine as a pop-culture bellwether in a light of her own.

results.title: Pantone’s Color(s) of the Year Have a Political Edge
results.abstract: The fashion world’s “color authority” has chosen a mix of two shades, a pink and a light blue, to symbolize the blurring of gender lines and stereotypes.

multimedia.caption: For the first time, Pantone chose a blend of two colors: Rose Quartz (a kind of mineral pink) and Serenity (a light blue).

results.title: Meet the 19-Year-Old Designer Twins Worn by Rihanna
